mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schoolmate ( name, phone, qq, wechat, college, the_class, address, graduation_year ) VALUE ( #{schoolmate.name}, #{schoolmate.phone}, #{schoolmate.qq}, #{schoolmate.wechat}, #{schoolmate.college}, #{schoolmate.theClass}, #{schoolmate.address}, #{schoolmate.graduationYear} );
mapper.update: UPDATE schoolmate SET name = #{schoolmate.name}, phone = #{schoolmate.phone}, qq = #{schoolmate.qq}, wechat = #{schoolmate.wechat}, college = #{schoolmate.college}, theClass = #{schoolmate.theClass}, address = #{schoolmate.address}, graduationYear = #{schoolmate.graduationYear}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schoolmate WHERE TRUE
AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{schoolmate.name}), '%')
